summary: This modification gives the player an ability to bend time. Mod contains two books with the same name, spelltome: bend time. The other one is for a spell version and the other one is for power version.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#666666][color=#b6b6b6][youtube]zibTFRg1BAs[/youtube]
This mod adds player a new spell and new power. These are both called, Bend Time.

This modification gives the player an ability to bend time. Mod contains two books with a same name(Spelltome: Bend Time). The other one is for a spell version and the other one is for power version. The player can for example dodge incoming arrows and spells or even catch the incoming arrows.

This spell is very useful in combat situations. Especially when shooting with bow. You can shoot many arrows before the first arrow even reaches the target. This mod is also good for making slowtime videos.[/color]
[/color]
Latest version includes a new .esp file and also changes the mod.


[color=#000000]

[size=4]


-UPDATE AND RELEASE NOTES-[/size][/color]

[color=red]-Version 1.0-[/color]

[color=grey]-First release. Brings player the spell.[/color]

[color=red]-Versions 1.1, 1.11 and 1.2-[/color]

[color=grey]-Brings player the power versions of the spell.

Powers are turned on pushing the power(Z) key, when the power is selected. Durations are 10 seconds, 15 seconds and 25 seconds. There are no limitations, that how many times the player can use the power per day.[/color]

[color=red]-Version 1.3-[/color]

[color=grey]-Brings player the much wanted toggle version of the spell. This is completely new ESP file, so if you want also the power version, you have to download version 1.2 and this.[/color]


[color=red]-Version 1.4-[/color]

[color=grey]-Brings player the toggle-power and toggle-spell.[/color]

[color=red]-Version 1.5-[/color]

[color=grey]-Adds a new character to the game, who will sell these books. Tarquan The Master Of Time. He usually hangs out in Whiterun's Dragonsreach doing his own stuff. Go talk to him and buy the spells. Tarquan will sell stuff between 8am and 8pm.[/color]

-Version 1.6-

-A completely remade mod. Before installing, delete the older versions from this mod. This version brings completely new esp file. Tarquan will no longer sell the books to the player. The spells will show up in the player's inventory, once the mod is installed. I also changed the name of the spells to bend time.




[color=#000000][size=4]

-BOOK LOCATIONS-[/size][/color]
(older versions)

[color=grey]-Throat Of The World - WordWall

-Whiterun - Dragonsreach - Farengar's table.

-Toggle versions are located in High Hrothgar. When you walk into High Hrothgar there will be an Altar with usually Arngeir praying at it, front right. Books are on the Altar, two books. Videos will show the specific location.[/color]


[/b]


[color=#000000][size=4]-I M P O R T A N T-[/size][/color]
[color=red]*Only if you have version older than 1.3*[/color]

[color=black]Things that will help you avoid a rare "perma" slow issue.

-Don't push the activation(Z) button many times in row, when the power is activated/on.

-Wait that the the power has fully ended, before launching it again. Best way to avoid any
problems is to wait 1-2 seconds after the power has ended before launching the it again.[/color]





[color=#000000][size=4]-CREDITS-[/size][/color]

[b]WarriorKeKe[/b]


-Website-
[url=http://wkcreations.blogspot.fi/]WKCreations[/url]


[color=black]
-T R A N S L A T I O N S-[/color]

DONATORS:
Max Fickas[/center]
